https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn._instruction: Add the atlas annotation which this parcellation entity defines.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn.label: Has annotation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasAn.name: hasAnnotation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa._instruction: Add for this parcellation entity the defined anatomical parent structure.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.label: Has parent
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.name: hasParent

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar._instruction: Add one or several parcellation terminologies to which this parcellation entity belongs.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.label: Is part of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name for this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the ontological term matching this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add the related UBERON parcellation term.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Related uberonterm
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relatedUBERONTerm

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add one or several relations of this parcellation entity to parcellation entities of other parcellation terminologies.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Relation assessment
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relationAssessment

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionInnovation
